Name: StudyX - Save Game Codes & Study Any Subject
About the game: StudyX is a great program for learning any subject. Level up your learning with your own games. Keep your notes and game codes safe in the steam cloud. Multiple study methods make sure that you become a master of your materials. Make sure you try StudyX, it is full of surprises. Studying Made Easy and Fun Your Games Level-Up Your Learning StudyX Empowers You With Free Workshop Content Join the Community & Share Content With Others Cloud Backup - Keep Your Game Codes Safe Never Forget With Built-in Notes Easy to Use Flash Card Maker and Games Create HTML games and study files for yourself or others! Get Your Life Changing Study Software Today! Add to your wishlist or purchase now. Enjoy!
